text: Oscar Fredrick Dronjak (born January 20, 1972) is the rhythm guitarist of the power metal band HammerFall. Prior to the success of HammerFall, he also played in the death metal bands Ceremonial Oath and Crystal Age. Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish heavy metal guitarists Category:HammerFall Category:Musicians from Gothenburg
title: Oscar Dronjak
